citations.narrative:
There is a build up of organic material and grime on the inside walls of the Asian small-clawed otter enclosure at the
public interaction area and on the side walls of the swimming tank. There is also a buildup of organic material and grime
on the inside walls of the enclosures housing the female sloth, African crested porcupines and pigs. The build up of
organic material and grime is a disease hazard and can produce and harbor odors. All enclosure surfaces must be
thoroughly cleaned as often as necessary to prevent a build up of organic materials and grime. Correct starting May 9,
2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representatives.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is a build up of organic material and grime on the inside walls of the Asian small-clawed otter enclosure at the 
public interaction area and on the side walls of the swimming tank.  There is also a buildup of organic material and grime 
on the inside walls of the enclosures housing the female sloth, African crested porcupines and pigs.  The build up of 
organic material and grime is a disease hazard and can produce and harbor odors. All enclosure surfaces must be 
thoroughly cleaned as often as necessary to prevent a build up of organic materials and grime.  Correct starting May 9, 
2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
